data.text: @MaddieLuebbert I felt a lot safer having to get tested on a weekly basis…
@kependall17 Oh that's not what should be happening... My school has still had regular testing each week.

@MaddieLuebbert I found it interesting that this isn’t rolling out until March but we haven’t had on-site testing starting 2 weeks now. No one came to our school last week and they weren’t there again today.
@MaddieLuebbert I'm glad to have the option. I hope we can demand time to get tested off of our lunch (for those of us covering all day)

Obviously this has to come to an end sometime, but I have no faith in the district's intentions and see this as just another way to collect even LESS data, a way to have asymptomatic spread to continue unabated. Many of our staff that have tested positive have been asymptomatic.
